lines.text: "Photography is truth. And cinema is truth 24 frames a second"
""The time for action has past, the time for reflection has come."
Ethics are the aesthetics of the future.
I win or lose, but fight on alone.
Photography is truth...and cinema is truth 24 times a second.
It's strange. When I look myself in the face... I get the feeling I don't match what I think it's inside.
Tell me lies. Say you don't care that I'm leaving.
I don't care that you're leaving. I'm not in love with you.
I don't know. Life says women are right. But gives death to men. Death is what's important. Van Gogh once said that death would take us to another star.
